example.name: Use a conditional expression
example.text: if is an expression, i.e. it returns a value. Therefore there is not ternary operator (condition ? then : else), because ordinary if works fine in this role.

example.name: Null-checks
example.text: A reference must be explicitly marked as nullable to be able hold a null. See Null-safety

example.name: is-checks and automatic casts
example.text: The is operator checks if an expression is an instance of a type (and more). If we is-checked an immutable local variable or property, there's no need to cast it explicitly to the is-checked type. See Classes and Inheritance. See Type casts.
